entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is mentioned as saying 'Don't start arguing again' to Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character in the story. He is mentioned as opening his mouth to retaliate against Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character in the story. She is mentioned as not listening to Ron's question about moonstone.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as assigning homework related to moonstone.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the Weasley twins. He is mentioned as being in the corner of the room with George and Lee Jordan.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the other Weasley twin. He is mentioned as being in the corner of the room with Fred and Lee Jordan.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as being in the corner of the room with Fred and George.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are arguing, as indicated by Harry's warning to Ron not to start again.
Ron is asking Hermione about the properties of moonstone, but she is not listening.
